page.title: 16GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: Most boys enjoy{cricket}most of all.{Cricket}is where a team bats,and another team fields.One of the fielding team bowl.A batsman tries to score runs by hitting the ball so that he has time to run to the other wicket.You can be caught,bowled,run out and it can be leg before wicket. These are all ways you can be out,then another batsman comes in. Most girls enjoy{netball. Netball} is when girls throw a ball to each other with there hands and try to put the ball through a net.You can not move while passing.{Rounders}can be played by boys and girls.It is like {cricket}except you have to run round four posts.{Football}is another boys game played in winter.
